titles.title: A bill to call on the Secretary of Homeland Security to lead a task force to address the threat of foreign government influence and threats to academic research integrity on college campuses, and for other purposes.
Protect Our Universities Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.
